title: Marina Pizza and Pasta
location: 2139 Lombard St San Francisco, CA 94123 United States Highway 101 & Fillmore St Marina/Cow Hollow

details.specialties: Marina Pizza and Pasta is cooking with fire! We give the customers the ability to customize their pizza right before their eyes. We offer 11' n' half inch pizzas with homemade Neapolitan dough and UNLIMITED toppings for $12.00. We also offer select Mac 'n' Cheese bowls and 5 different salads. We source the freshest ingredients from local vendors to provide our customers with great dishes!
details.history: Established in 1978. Barb Megyeri moved to Colorado from Michigan and opened the first Marina Pizza and Pasta in 1978, since then her son Kevin Megyeri and wife Suzette Megyeri have taken pizza to whole other level! Over the years Marina Pizza and Pasta became a staple for Italian food within the community. With homemade pizza sauce sauce and dough made from scratch daily. Marina Pizza and Pasta has evolved tremendously over the years, presently making Neapolitan pizza dough, hand stretched Mozzarella, and sourcing ingredients from local vendors, delivering a finished pizza to the customer in under five minutes. The 'BAM-FAM' at Marina Pizza and Pasta strongly believe in the importance of marrying quality with speed.

title: Farmhouse Kitchen Thai Cuisine
location: 710 Florida St San Francisco, CA 94110 19th St & 20th St Mission

details.specialties: Not your typical Thai! We are a Thai New Generation restaurant focusing on bringing you adventurous, bold flavors of traditional and non-traditional dishes using the freshest ingredients. Look out for our nightly specials from regional home cooked dishes to market fried grasshoppers. We are consistently voted the 'Best Thai Restaurant' in San Francisco by Michelin Bib Gourmand 2016 - 2019
details.history: Established in 2015. We think SF is ready for a fun, dynamic Thai food from regional cooking dishes to our grandma's recipes. Currently, we are offering many Northern Thai dishes from Chiangmai, Chiang Rai, and Loei. Chef/owner, 'POP', is originally from Loei but spent most of his adulthood in Bangkok. Pop attributes his passion for food to his daily trips to the local market with his grandma. In which, a dish called 'Panang Nuea' 24hrs braised Short ribs in panang spices and coconut milk reminiscent of his childhood where he cooked a large meal for his entire family. Farmhouse Kitchen has been certified as a Thai Select restaurant, honoring its cooking which utilizes authentic Thai ingredients.

title: Dumpling Baby China Bistro
location: 3751 Geary Blvd San Francisco, CA 94118 2nd Ave & Arguello Blvd Inner Richmond

details.specialties: Family owned and operated contemporary Chinese-American eatery featuring signature wok'd classics and popular dumplings.

title: The Melt
location: 925 Market St 5th St San Francisco, CA 94103 Union Square, SoMa

details.specialties: At The Melt, our mission is to deliver an 'I Love It Here Experience' to each & every guest. Our menu features handcrafted MeltBurgers made from a custom blend of Angus & Wagyu beef, melty grilled cheeses, crispy fries, homemade mac 'n' cheese, handspun milkshakes and wholesome soup and salads. Enjoy ordering from friendly crew members or through helpful technology, including in-store self-order kiosks, and The Melt Apps for both iOs and Android.

title: House of Thai
location: 901 Larkin St San Francisco, CA 94109 Geary St & Cedar St Lower Nob Hill

details.specialties: We have a varieties of Thai food more than 100 items. We have some special dishes that make it only one in the city. We cook it FAST. FRESH. TASTY.
details.history: Established in 1999. This is Family own business. We provide a quality of food more than 10 years. We are 'Thai House Express' in the beginning until generations to generations. Then, we are 'House of Thai'. We promise to get better and better for serving Thai food and quality in the city.

title: Buster's Cheesesteak
location: 366 Columbus Ave San Francisco, CA 94133 Vallejo St & Grant Ave North Beach/Telegraph Hill, Russian Hill

details.specialties: Salads like the grilled chicken Caesar salad, sandwiches like their famous Philly Steak Sandwich that you can choose the option of having it made with steak or chicken and your choice of cheese. They even offer vegetarian sandwiches like the Blondie Sandwich - a sandwich layered with Tofu, spinach, bell peppers, onion, zucchini, and guacamole. Then there is the pasta like the Cheese Ravioli and Fettuccine Alfredo and more! You can get House Special Pizzas like the Mission Bell (Mexican) Pizza - a pizza topped with ground beef, onions, fresh tomatoes, black olives, and jalapenos or the Valencia Special Pizza - loaded with artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, black olives, and zucchini or you can create your very own fantasy pizza.
